name: A Bar in Space (LD#42)
description:
(Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare #42)

It’s the year 2000, at last, humankind found life outside of earth ! On a keyboard floating in space, tiny aliens have built a space bar, on top of the spacebar.

This is our chance to find all the answers to life, the universe and existence itself, the aliens will give it to us in one condition :

We must stop the space bar on the spacebar from running out of space - in space !

QWERTY Layout is required for best gaming experience !!
